resources.string: OpenGLBase
Droidcon Berlin 2024
Building a native AR app with Compose & OpenGL ES

This project showcases how to integrate OpenGL ES rendering with Jetpack Compose. The different samples go from more basic to more complex integrating ARCore.


This project has been created by Pau Guillamon for the Droidcon Berlin 2024 conference.
This project requires ARCore to be installed and up to date. If your device is not supported by ARCore, some samples won\'t work.
